    • isMousePressed

      public static boolean isMousePressed(int keyCode)
      Returns true the frame the mousebutton was pressed Can only be called in the update (not in updateSecound)
      Parameters:
      keyCode - the button to check
      Returns:
      true

    • isKeyDown

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the keyCode is held down
